name: Nightmare Busters
description:
When an evil fiend called the Tyrant hijacks and spoils the dreams of small children, two bold leprechauns named Flynn and Floyd jump into action to stop him. Armed with razor-sharp playing cards, the courageous brothers can also summon magical attacks to destroy the various beasts they encounter. Traversing the inner depths of the dream world, they must overcome all the Tyrant's minions before facing the bloated monster himself.

Nightmare Busters is a standard run and gun action game which requires quick reflexes to complete. The game can be played alone, or by two players who take on the monster hordes simultaneously in a cooperative effort.

shot.caption: The main menu allows you to toggle between the one and two player modes or configure game options before starting play.
Two player mode is meant to be cooperative, so don't let your partner get burnt by a bad deal!
Even the walls are out to get you. This mission isn't going to be easy...
There's a showdown in the forest, and neither man is backing down.
Never let the enemy get you “over a barrel” – or under one, for that matter!
Sadly, no one was around to give Flynn the ever helpful advice, “Don't look down!”
These baddies aren't just blowing smoke; they're playing with fire! But don't get hot under the collar! Stop, drop and rock 'n' roll!
As if Flynn wasn't already going batty from dealing with hordes of vicious enemies...
Send your foes flying with a little foul weather!
The castle tower is one of the many places the korrigans congregate.
Will the old ball and chain send Flynn over the edge?
With bogeys coming in from all directions, Flynn prepares to deal 'em a few bad hands.
Put this guy out of commission before he can show you what else he's got under his coat!
Flynn powers up for the next challenge.
